The Invisible Joker specifically *needs* me to play rounds. If I play the Small Blind, the Invisible Joker will become 2/2, ready to sell in the shop before the Big Blind. If I skip, I'm at 1/2. Ultimately, skipping means missing a shop, delaying the Invisible Joker, and not activating Rocket. So, the benefit of getting a duplicate Joker one round earlier outweighs the $25 from the Investment Tag and the Big Blind reward ($4).
